title: Enhancing CS Practical Skills: Strategy for Linking School Facility Quality and Learning Outcomes: Qualitative Case Study

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general understanding of school environmental elements
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of school facility quality (lighting, spatial arrangement, etc.) on learning attitudes using VR simulation.
Explain the mediating effects of the physical environment on school climate (student-teacher relationships, engagement) through case study methods.
Design a tool to quantitatively evaluate learning outcomes (concentration, problem-solving skills) using simulation data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
